name: Hexfactory
description:
Build and protect cities with factories in an infinite hex world.

Best way to play the game: Singleplayer / Mouse and Keyboard.


  • Balance production and consumption of your city.
  • Research new technologies,
  • Build more factories,
  • Build more cities,
  • Explore new tiles and new planets,
  • Protect your cities from alien sabotage,
  • Use the Map Maker to build your own worlds,
  • Get Steam Achievements,
  • Compare with other players with the Steam Leaderboards!

Multiplayer Online Stock Exchange.

Reach tier 5 to be able to trade items in the Stock Market with other players online in real-time.

Features in this prototype:


  • 41 Initial Buildings (Build Roads, Miners, Farms, Factories, Houses and Services)
  • 15 Initial types of Tiles
  • 7 Research areas
  • 2 Citizen class
  • 1 Alien Saboteur class
  • 1 Spaceship class
  • 39 Parts to produce
  • 2 Planets (Earth and Moon)
  • Testing phase of the Online Stock Market
Some thoughts for the next versions of the game:
  • + new Buildings (More factories, farms, power generators, miners...)
  • + new tile types (Desert, uranium, pasture, bauxite, oil...)
  • + parts to produce ( Canned Food, Tools, Satellites, Smartphones...)
  • + Citzen Classes (Engineers, Scientists, Ecologists...)
  • + types of houses
  • + types of services (Health Center, School, Stadium...)
  • Manual Turrets, Automatic Turrets and Spaceship to fight new enemies

And more thoughts...
